title: Calories in a Tootsie Roll
meta_description: Discover calories in a tootsie roll, including carbs, sugars, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per piece for quick reference.
assumptions: Standard small Tootsie Roll candy (~9.5 g), milk chocolate flavored, no fillings or variations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, batch, and exact recipe. Check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Tootsie Roll provides about 35 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Tootsie Roll Pop (with hard candy shell)

faqs.q: How many calories in a single Tootsie Roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 35 kcal per standard small piece.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Tootsie Roll?
faqs.a: About 8 g total carbs, including 5.5 g sugars and 0.2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Tootsie Roll have fat or protein?
faqs.a: 1 g total fat (0.6 g saturated) and 0.4 g protein per piece.
Yes, only about 10 mg sodium per Tootsie Roll.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in Tootsie Rolls?
faqs.a: Mini versions have ~17 kcal; jumbo can reach 70 kcal or more.
